original_text: You will see how trouble comes to my home here. Good things will happen to the Israelite people, but there will never be an old man in your family. You will see how trouble comes to my home here. Good things will happen to the Israelite people, but there will never be an old man in your family.
korean_text: 이스라엘에게 모든 복을 내리는 중에 너는 내 처소의 환난을 볼 것이요 네 집에 영원토록 노인이 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will see how trouble comes to my home here
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 재앙이 내 집에 내림을 보게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Good things will happen to the Israelite people
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성에게는 좋은 일들이 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: but there will never be an old man in your family
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 네 집안에는 늙은이가 결코 없을 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will see how trouble comes to my home here
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 재앙이 내 집에 내림을 보게 될 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성에게는 좋은 일들이 일어날 것이다
